languages.text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by −25% and its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +25% (by at least 1 shot).
languages.original_text: Атаки с помощью выбранного дистанционного оружия получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Отдача{/g} уменьшается на 25%, а {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} повышается на 25% (минимум на 1 выстрел)

traits.locale_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to hit chance. Its Recoil is reduced by -25% and its rate of fire is increased by +25% (by at least 1 shot).

languages.text: 使用选定的远程武器进行攻击时，获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}加值。此武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}降低25%，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}提高25%（至少增加1发子弹）。

traits.locale_text: 使用选定的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器进行攻击时，获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。此武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}降低25%，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}提高25%（至少增加1发子弹）。

languages.text: Los ataques con el arma a distancia elegida reciben una bonificación de +20 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g}. Su {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} se reduce en un −25% y su {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} aumenta en un +25 % (al menos 1 disparo más).
languages.original_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by −25% and its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +25% (by at least 1 shot).

traits.locale_text: Los ataques con el arma {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} elegida reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g}. Su {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} se reduce en un −25% y su {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} aumenta en un +25 % (al menos 1 disparo más).

languages.text: Angriffe mit der ausgewählten Fernkampfwaffe erhalten einen Bonus von +20 % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. Ihr {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} wird um −25 % reduziert und ihre {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} um +25 % erhöht (für mindestens 1 Schuss).
languages.original_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by −25% and its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +25% (by at least 1 shot).

traits.locale_text: Angriffe mit der ausgewählten {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffe{/g} erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}. Ihr {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} wird um −25 % reduziert und ihre {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} um +25 % erhöht (für mindestens 1 Schuss).

languages.text: Un bonus de +20 % s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} lors des attaques menées avec l'arme à distance choisie. Son {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} est réduit de −25 % tandis que sa {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} augmente de +25 % (1 tir minimum).
languages.original_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by −25% and its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +25% (by at least 1 shot).

traits.locale_text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +20 % s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} lors des attaques menées avec l'arme {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} choisie. Son {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} est réduit de -25 % tandis que sa {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} augmente de +25 % (1 tir minimum).

languages.text: 選択した遠隔武器での攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に+20%のボーナスを得る。{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が−25%され、{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}が+25%増加する（最低1発）
languages.original_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by −25% and its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +25% (by at least 1 shot).

traits.locale_text: 選択した遠隔武器での攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に+20%のボーナスを得る。{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が−25%され、{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}が+25%増加する（最低1発）

languages.text: Seçilen menzilli silahla yapılan saldırılar, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılıklarına{/g} +%20 bonus kazanırlar. Saldırıların {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}geri tepmesi{/g} %25 azalırken {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} ise +%25 artar (en az 1 atış).
